name: The Interview (itch) (Iyad.Hout)
description:
This is a short game I made as a sort of cover letter to apply to a writer position to a game studio called Dreamfeel. 

For context, the job application mentioned that they proffered a candidate with interactive fiction experience and personal experience immigrating to Ireland (where the studio is based).

Anyway, hope you enjoy, and if you're from Dreamfeel, I hope you REALLY enjoy this!
